mapper.select: SELECT TH_REGION, COUNT(*) AS 'COUNT' FROM ( SELECT TH_NUM, TH_REGION FROM THEATER ORDER BY TH_NUM ) AS T GROUP BY TH_REGION;

SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(SC_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE, CASE DAYOFWEEK(SC_TIME) WHEN 1 then "일" WHEN 2 then "월" WHEN 3 then "화" WHEN 4 then "수" WHEN 5 then "목" WHEN 6 then "금" WHEN 7 then "토" END AS dayWeek FROM SCREEN WHERE CI_NUM IN (SELECT CI_NUM FROM CINEMA WHERE TH_NUM = #{TH_NUM} ) and DATE_FORMAT(SC_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') >= current_date() ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(SC_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d');

SELECT S.CI_NUM as S.CI_NUM , C.TH_NUM as TH_NUM , C.MOVIE_NUM as MOVIE_NUM , C.CI_NUMBER as CI_NUMBER , S.ROW as 'ROW' , S.COL AS 'COL' , DATE_FORMAT(S.SC_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d/%H:%i:%s') AS SC_TIME , DATE_FORMAT(S.SC_TIME_END, '%Y-%m-%d/%H:%i:%s') SC_TIME_END , M.TITLE AS TITLE , LEFT(M.RATING, 2) RATING , M.GENRE AS GENRE , M.RELEASEDATE AS DATE , ((current_date() - M.RELEASEDATE) * -1) D_DAY FROM CINEMA C JOIN SCREEN S ON C.CI_NUM = S.CI_NUM JOIN MOVIE M ON C.MOVIE_NUM = M.MOVIE_NUM WHERE TH_NUM = #{TH_NUM} AND DATE_FORMAT(S.SC_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{SC_DATE} ORDER BY RELEASEDATE, MOVIE_NUM;
